title: hack
body:
hi guys
yeasterday one of my friends  and me want it to play laague of legends 
i type my username and password and logg in
but my frend cant logg in to his acc
it says as username or  pass word is incorrect
idk what is happ pls help us
we try it 100 times but same thing
{{champion:412}} {{item:3026}}

replies.body:
If your friend is unable to recover access to their account with the password reset that *Rineyy* suggested, I recommend your friend [create a support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) After they submit a ticket, one of our account specialists will get back to them to assist in recovering their account. 

Let me know if you or your friend have any questions.
Go tell your friend to reset the password with his email
